Name: BBC (by Marian Beke)
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of apple fan or dehydrated apple slice.
Garnish with apple fan or apple slice.
Review: Based on the classic B & B cocktail with rum replacing brandy and Becherovka in place of Bénédictine.
History: Created in 2009 by Marian Beke at the Artesian Bar , London, England. The Artesian Bar sits in the Langham Hotel opposite the BBC's Broadcasting House. Indeed, the BBC moved into the Langham after the Broadcasting House was bombed during the Second World War ... they stayed almost 20 years.
